title: 820-2879-b bad ram slots
message: This board seems to be prone to bad ram slots. Got another one but this time both of the ram slots gone bad. Is any way to fix at least one of them? Or is any other trick to make it usable?

title: 820-2879-b bad ram slots
message: Does it give 3 beeps or 1 beep?

title: 820-2879-b bad ram slots
message:
Neither. It works but when you flex the motherboard especially where the ram slots are it freezes/image distorts. Especially when I push on one of the corner of ram slots. 
I tried re-flowing the ram slots at 300C. It did nothing.

title: 820-2879-b bad ram slots
message: Yeah, just forget about this one.
